attributes.action: Renationalize the essential services, such as water, electricity, gas and the railways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These industries are heavily subsidised yet we have to pay again for them at the point of use.
Our tax is being used to pay shareholders and ridiculous salaries to executives in these companies. Far from being "stakeholders" privatisation has made us beholden to private interests.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
